segments.source_content: ## Key Concepts

translations.zh-hant: ## 核心概念

segments.source_content: The keys to integrating React Native components into your Android application are to:

translations.zh-hant: 將 React Native 元件整合至 Android 應用的關鍵在於：

segments.source_content:
1. Set up React Native dependencies and directory structure.
2. Develop your React Native components in JavaScript.
3. Add a `ReactRootView` to your Android app. This view will serve as the container for your React Native component.
4. Start the React Native server and run your native application.
5. Verify that the React Native aspect of your application works as expected.

translations.zh-hant:
1. 設定 React Native 依賴項與目錄結構
2. 使用 JavaScript 開發 React Native 元件
3. 在 Android 應用中添加 `ReactRootView`，該視圖將作為 React Native 元件的容器
4. 啟動 React Native 伺服器並運行原生應用
5. 驗證應用的 React Native 功能是否符合預期

segments.source_content: ## Prerequisites

translations.zh-hant: ## 必要條件

segments.source_content: Follow the React Native CLI Quickstart in the [environment setup guide](environment-setup) to configure your development environment for building React Native apps for Android.

translations.zh-hant: 請依照[環境設定指南](environment-setup)中的 React Native CLI 快速入門，配置 Android 版 React Native 應用的開發環境。

segments.source_content: ### 1. Set up directory structure

translations.zh-hant: ### 1. 設定目錄結構

segments.source_content: To ensure a smooth experience, create a new folder for your integrated React Native project, then copy your existing Android project to an `/android` subfolder.

translations.zh-hant: 為確保流程順暢，請為整合專案新建資料夾，並將現有 Android 專案複製到 `/android` 子資料夾中。

segments.source_content: ### 2. Install JavaScript dependencies

translations.zh-hant: ### 2. 安裝 JavaScript 依賴項

segments.source_content: Go to the root directory for your project and create a new `package.json` file with the following contents:

translations.zh-hant: 進入專案根目錄，建立包含以下內容的 `package.json` 檔案：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_41a8ae85

segments.source_content: Next, make sure you have [installed the yarn package manager](https://yarnpkg.com/lang/en/docs/install/).

translations.zh-hant: 接著請確認已[安裝 yarn 套件管理工具](https://yarnpkg.com/lang/en/docs/install/)。

segments.source_content: Install the `react` and `react-native` packages. Open a terminal or command prompt, then navigate to the directory with your `package.json` file and run:

translations.zh-hant: 安裝 `react` 和 `react-native` 套件。開啟終端機或命令提示字元，導航至含 `package.json` 的目錄並執行：

segments.source_content:
```shell
$ yarn add react-native
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_4dd51304

segments.source_content: This will print a message similar to the following (scroll up in the yarn output to see it):

translations.zh-hant: 這將輸出類似以下的訊息（請在 yarn 輸出中向上滾動查看）：

translations.zh-hant: > 警告："react-native@0.70.5" 有未滿足的 peer 依賴項 "react@18.1.0"

segments.source_content: This is OK, it means we also need to install React:

translations.zh-hant: 這是正常現象，表示我們還需要安裝 React：

```shell

```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_48ec8149

segments.source_content: Yarn has created a new `/node_modules` folder. This folder stores all the JavaScript dependencies required to build your project.

translations.zh-hant: Yarn 已建立新的 `/node_modules` 資料夾，此資料夾存放專案建構所需的所有 JavaScript 依賴項。

segments.source_content: Add `node_modules/` to your `.gitignore` file.

translations.zh-hant: 請將 `node_modules/` 加入 `.gitignore` 檔案。

segments.source_content: ### Configuring Gradle

translations.zh-hant: ### 配置 Gradle

segments.source_content: React Native uses the React Native Gradle Plugin to configure your dependencies and project setup.

translations.zh-hant: React Native 使用 React Native Gradle 插件來配置依賴項與專案設定。

segments.source_content: First, let's edit your `settings.gradle` file by adding this line:

translations.zh-hant: 首先編輯 `settings.gradle` 檔案，加入這行程式碼：

segments.source_content:
```groovy
includeBuild('../node_modules/react-native-gradle-plugin')
```

segments.source_content: Then you need to open your top level `build.gradle` and include this line:

translations.zh-hant: 接著開啟頂層的 `build.gradle` 並包含這行程式碼：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_7d13cf22

segments.source_content:
This makes sure the React Native Gradle Plugin is available inside your project.
Finally, add those lines inside your app's `build.gradle` file (it's a different `build.gradle` file inside your app folder):

translations.zh-hant:
這確保 React Native Gradle 插件能在專案中使用。
最後在應用模組的 `build.gradle` 檔案（位於應用資料夾內的另一個 `build.gradle` 檔案）中加入以下程式碼：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_8c3563d3

segments.source_content: Those dependencies are available on `mavenCentral()` so make sure you have it defined in your `repositories{}` block.

translations.zh-hant: 這些依賴項可從 `mavenCentral()` 取得，請確認已在 `repositories{}` 區塊中定義。

segments.source_content:
:::info
We intentionally don't specify the version for those `implementation` dependencies as the React Native Gradle Plugin will take care of it. If you don't use the React Native Gradle Plugin, you'll have to specify version manually.
:::

:::info
我們刻意不指定這些 `implementation` 依賴項的版本，因為 React Native Gradle 插件會自動處理。若未使用該插件，則需手動指定版本。

segments.source_content: ### Enable native modules autolinking

translations.zh-hant: ### 啟用原生模組自動連結

segments.source_content: To use the power of [autolinking](https://github.com/react-native-community/cli/blob/master/docs/autolinking.md), we have to apply it a few places. First add the following entry to `settings.gradle`:

translations.zh-hant: 要使用[自動連結](https://github.com/react-native-community/cli/blob/master/docs/autolinking.md)功能，需在幾個地方進行配置。首先在 `settings.gradle` 中加入：

segments.source_content:
```gradle
apply from: file("../node_modules/@react-native-community/cli-platform-android/native_modules.gradle"); applyNativeModulesSettingsGradle(settings)
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_59534425

segments.source_content: Next add the following entry at the very bottom of the `app/build.gradle`:

translations.zh-hant: 接著在 `app/build.gradle` 最底部加入：

segments.source_content:
```gradle
apply from: file("../../node_modules/@react-native-community/cli-platform-android/native_modules.gradle"); applyNativeModulesAppBuildGradle(project)
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_342e4d80

segments.source_content: ### Cleartext Traffic (API level 28+)

translations.zh-hant: ### 明文流量（API 等級 28+）

segments.source_content: > Starting with Android 9 (API level 28), cleartext traffic is disabled by default; this prevents your application from connecting to the [Metro bundler][metro]. The changes below allow cleartext traffic in debug builds.

translations.zh-hant: > 從 Android 9（API 等級 28）開始，預設禁用明文流量；這會阻止應用程式連接到 [Metro 打包工具][metro]。以下變更允許在偵錯版本中使用明文流量。

segments.source_content: #### 1. Apply the `usesCleartextTraffic` option to your Debug `AndroidManifest.xml`

translations.zh-hant: #### 1. 將 `usesCleartextTraffic` 選項套用至偵錯版 `AndroidManifest.xml`

segments.source_content:
```xml
<!-- ... -->
<application
  android:usesCleartextTraffic="true" tools:targetApi="28" >
  <!-- ... -->
</application>
<!-- ... -->
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_4c6754b2

segments.source_content: This is not required for Release builds.

translations.zh-hant: 發行版本無需此設定。

segments.source_content: To learn more about Network Security Config and the cleartext traffic policy [see this link](https://developer.android.com/training/articles/security-config#CleartextTrafficPermitted).

translations.zh-hant: 深入了解網路安全設定與明文流量政策，請[參閱此連結](https://developer.android.com/training/articles/security-config#CleartextTrafficPermitted)。

segments.source_content: ### Creating a release build in Android Studio

translations.zh-hant: ### 在 Android Studio 建立正式版建置

segments.source_content: You can use Android Studio to create your release builds too! It’s as quick as creating release builds of your previously-existing native Android app.

translations.zh-hant: 您也可使用 Android Studio 建立正式版建置！這與為既有原生 Android 應用建立正式版的流程同樣快速。

segments.source_content: If you use the React Native Gradle Plugin as described above, everything should work when running app from Android Studio.

translations.zh-hant: 若您按照前述方式使用 React Native Gradle 插件，從 Android Studio 運行應用時一切應能正常運作。

segments.source_content: If you're not using the React Native Gradle Plugin, there’s one additional step which you’ll have to do before every release build. You need to execute the following to create a React Native bundle, which will be included with your native Android app:

translations.zh-hant: 若未使用 React Native Gradle 插件，則每次正式版建置前需額外執行以下步驟，以建立將包含在原生 Android 應用中的 React Native 套件：

segments.source_content:
```shell
$ npx react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/com/your-company-name/app-package-name/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/com/your-company-name/app-package-name/src/main/res/
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_be9750ef

segments.source_content: > Don’t forget to replace the paths with correct ones and create the assets folder if it doesn’t exist.

translations.zh-hant: > 請務必替換為正確路徑，若 assets 資料夾不存在則需建立。

segments.source_content: Now, create a release build of your native app from within Android Studio as usual and you should be good to go!

translations.zh-hant: 現在，如常透過 Android Studio 建立原生應用的正式版建置，即可完成部署！
